posts.post_content:
Hello,

T210 bug had bited me earlier this month and I was able to pick up more than 10 of them. I really love how they look with red border and pencil art work on players.

I would love to see if you guys have low grade in SGC holder for sale? raw/psa will work well as well. 

Best,
Danny

Have this card from the Series 3 set. Not sure if you need it, but feel free to make an offer on it if you do
Thanks
Tom
